scripts.build:all: bun build src/index.tsx --compile --target=bun-darwin-arm64 --outfile dist/ghn-darwin-arm64 && bun build src/index.tsx --compile --target=bun-darwin-x64 --outfile dist/ghn-darwin-x64 && bun build src/index.tsx --compile --target=bun-linux-x64 --outfile dist/ghn-linux-x64 && bun build src/index.tsx --compile --target=bun-linux-arm64 --outfile dist/ghn-linux-arm64 && bun build src/index.tsx --compile --target=bun-windows-x64 --outfile dist/ghn-windows-x64.exe
